roleset.name: annoy slightly
roleset.note: MIFF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'miff' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from miff.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: just transitive
example.text: What *trace* miffed many USX executives and shareholders was that the acquisition, for $3 billion of stock, doubled the USX shares outstanding and considerably diluted them.
example.arg: What -> that the acquisition, for $3 billion of stock, doubled the USX shares outstanding and considerably diluted them

example.name: passivized with instrument
example.text: John-1 was sorely miffed *trace*-1 by Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie.
example.arg: by Mary's offer of freshly-baked apple pie
